Package org.jdesktop.xswingx

Class Summary
JXFormattedPromptField JFormattedTextField, which wraps the default UI class into a PromptTextFieldUI and provides convenience methods for getting and setting label properties supported by PromptSupport.
JXPromptArea JTextArea, which wraps the default UI class into a PromptTextAreaUI and provides convenience methods for getting and setting prompt properties supported by PromptSupport.
JXPromptField JTextField, which wraps the default UI class into a PromptTextFieldUI and provides convenience methods for getting and setting prompt properties supported by PromptSupport.
JXSearchField A text field with a search icon in which the user enters text that identifies items to search for.
JXSearchField.IconButton Non focusable, no border, no margin and insets button with no content area filled.
PromptSupport Sets prompt text, foreground, background and PromptSupport.FocusBehavior properties on a JTextComponent by calling JComponent.putClientProperty(Object, Object).
RecentSearches Maintains a list of recent searches and persists this list automatically using Preferences.
RecentSearches.RecentSearchesPopup The popup menu returned by RecentSearches.createPopupMenu(JXSearchField).
 

Enum Summary
JXSearchField.LayoutStyle Defines, how the search and clear button are layouted.
JXSearchField.SearchMode Defines when action events are posted.
PromptSupport.FocusBehavior Determines how the JTextComponent is rendered when focused and no text is present.
